com.vmware.vcenter.vm

Interface Tools

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, ToolsTypes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ToolsStub

    public interface Tools
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, ToolsTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Tools interface provides methods for managing VMware Tools in the guest operating system. This interface was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Tools.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Tools#get vAPI operation.
      static interface  Tools.UpdateInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Tools#update vAPI operation.
      static interface  Tools.UpgradeInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Tools#upgrade vAPI operation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.vm.ToolsTypes

        ToolsTypes.Info, ToolsTypes.RunState, ToolsTypes.ToolsInstallType, ToolsTypes.UpdateSpec, ToolsTypes.UpgradePolicy, ToolsTypes.VersionStatus

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.vm.ToolsTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tools.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String vm)
      Get the properties of VMware Tools.
      Tools.UpdateInvocation update(java.lang.String vm, ToolsTypes.UpdateSpec spec)

      Tools.UpgradeInvocation upgrade(java.lang.String vm)

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Tools.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String vm)
        Get the properties of VMware Tools. This method was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.

        Invocation Result:
        VMware Tools properties.

        Parameters:
        vm - Identifier of the virtual machine. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: VirtualMachine.
        Returns:
        instance of Tools.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - if the system reports an error while responding to the request.
        NotFound - if the virtual machine is not found.
        Unauthenticated - if the user cannot be authenticated.

      • update

        Tools.UpdateInvocation update(java.lang.String vm,
                              ToolsTypes.UpdateSpec spec)
        Update the properties of VMware Tools. This method was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.
        Parameters:
        vm - Identifier of the virtual machine. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: VirtualMachine.
        spec - The new values.
        Returns:
        instance of Tools.UpdateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described update operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - if the system reports an error while responding to the request.
        InvalidArgument - if the ToolsTypes.UpdateSpec.getUpgradePolicy() property contains a value that is not supported by the server.
        NotFound - if the virtual machine is not found.
        Unauthenticated - if the user cannot be authenticated.

      • upgrade

        Tools.UpgradeInvocation upgrade(java.lang.String vm)
        Begins the Tools upgrade process. To monitor the status of the Tools upgrade, clients should check the Tools status by calling get(java.lang.String) and examining getVersionStatus() and getRunState(). This method was added in vSphere API 7.0.0.0.
        Parameters:
        vm - Identifier of the virtual machine. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: VirtualMachine.
        Returns:
        instance of Tools.UpgradeInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described upgrade operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        NotFound - if the virtual machine is not found.
        ServiceUnavailable - if the VMware Tools are not running.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - if the virtual machine is not powered on.
        AlreadyInDesiredState - is an upgrade is already in progress.
        Error - if the upgrade process fails inside the guest operating system.
        Unauthenticated - if the user cannot be authenticated.
